text: @GOP It is extremely disconcerting that animal trials are being omitted in an attempt to rush a never-before developed coronavirus vaccine to market. This is very bad & is not supported by traditional scientific/immunological principles. @POTUS @WhiteHouse @PressSec @KellyannePolls.
